item.title: 'Wi-fi is dead': Why Iran-bound USS Abraham Lincoln is now cut-off from the entire world? - WION
item.description: ‘Wi-fi is dead’: Why Iran-bound USS Abraham Lincoln is now cut-off from the entire world? WION‘Hitting Targets’—Iran’s Hackers Use Starlink To Attack Israel Forbes’Sailing by Starlight’: How USS Abraham Lincoln is navigating Arabian Sea without GPS or radar WIONIran-linked ‘Handala Hack’ now routing attacks via Starlink, Cyber firm says ایران اینترنشنال

item.title: As the world inches back to a pre-WW2 order, the 'middle powers' face a grave new challenge
item.description: With economic stagnation and extremes of inequality comes corrosion of trust in democratic institutions. So Trump may be a symptom, not a cause, of what Carney called a “rupture” with the post-WW2 order.
